Verification Report: VCS Version 4.2

visit, from the photos /09/ and found consistent with the details mentioned in the monitoring report /1.2/. The energy meters are in accordance with the registered VCS-PD /05/.

During the monitoring period, no replacement of meter was observed.

Electricity export and import is measured at two levels i.e. energy meters installed at power house and_ energy meters installed at substation.

Last calibration of the energy meters was done on 18/02/2021 and latest calibration was done in December 2022 /23/ by government authority. Since the calibration was delayed, PP has applied the maximum error 0.204% identified during the latest calibrations (December 2022) /23/ for the period from 01/07/2022 to 31/12/2022 and monthly electricity export and import has been corrected accordingly. The same_ is verified from the revised ER sheet /2.2/ and revised MR /1.2/. Verification team has found the approach conservative and hence accepted to the verification
